name: Iron Bank
description: Iron Bank is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals, institutions and protocols to access financial services. Built by Cream in collaboration with Yearn Finance, it is a permissionless, open source and blockchain agnostic protocol serving users on Ethereum and Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Iron Bank to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account. The difference between Iron Bank and Cream v1 is that in Iron Bank trusted protocols can take out a zero collateral loan when whitelisted.
